seo_keywords: Shark robot side brushes falling off

problems.title: Short Runtime / Dies off dock
solution_steps: The RV750 battery typically lasts 18-24 months.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a ION Robot (RV750 / RV761)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $415 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my ION Robot (RV750 / RV761) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my ION Robot (RV750 / RV761) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
